about_the_game:
SEX EXIT 🔞

Step into a world where desire meets fear.

The game takes place in an abandoned research complex, where twisted sexual experiments were once conducted on humans. This eerie place, filled with dark secrets and creepy vibes, is waiting for you to uncover its mysteries.

You play as a mercenary who takes on a shady contract from a mysterious corporation. The job? Explore the complex, check the condition of its rooms, and file reports. Sounds simple, right? But with every step you take, the deeper the rabbit hole goes. You'll meet strange employees, stumble across chilling logs, and uncover the horrifying truth behind the experiments.

When you finish the job, you'll feel a sense of relief—only for it to be ripped away in the most unexpected way. The moment you try to leave, you realize there’s no way out. You’re now part of the complex, trapped as another test subject doomed to suffer the same experiments you came to investigate.

Features:


  • A deep and gripping storyline with psychological thriller vibes.
  • Creepy, atmospheric locations filled with hidden clues and disturbing details.
  • Interactive dialogues and notes to piece together the dark history of the complex.
  • A shocking twist ending that flips everything on its head.
  • Adult content that amplifies the game’s provocative and intense themes.

    SEX EXIT 🔞 is a game that will push your courage to the limit, throwing you into a dark world where the line between desire and terror becomes almost invisible. Will you make it out, or will you become part of the nightmare?

content_descriptors.notes: This game features mature content, including explicit sexual acts, provocative outfits, nudity, sexual animations, and scenes of masturbation. These elements are key to the storyline and character development. All characters depicted are 18 or older.

name: SEX EXIT 🔞

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: SEX EXIT 🔞Explore an abandoned research complex where twisted sexual experiments took place. Uncover dark secrets, meet eerie characters, and piece together its disturbing past. But beware—completing your mission may trap you forever as part of the nightmare. Will you escape?
